dialogue.text: It looks like you killed John Wick's dog
<Normal>Normal words or something i dunno this is just for testing :3
<Casual>Cool words or <Normal>something<Sad> i<Casual> dunno this is also<Terrified> just for testing :3
Pause words<Pause=1.5> or something i dunno<Pause=5.0> this is also just for testing :3
<Terrified>5 Deaths already?!<Pause=1.5> Uhhhh<Casual> failing is part of learning, folks!
<Disappointed> sigh, you´ve died 100 times. <Pause=2> I´m not mad but SUPER disappointed....
Hey man wanna hear a joke? <Pause=2> A rhetorical question since i´m about to tell you,
A man went to get his prostate checked, and went into the doctors office, the doctor shook his hand and greeted him.
Then when he sat down on the table, the doctor said Now Jerry, dont get an erection, the man replied, My names not Jerry, it´s Erik, the doctor said I know, my names Jerry!
<Sad>(There´s a great sadness in his eyes, you observe how he distants himself from the table with slow movements. Repressing the tears would betray his demeanor to you.)
<Casual> He mumbles to himself, you can´t quite make out what but it had something to do about dinner tonight
